snippet.title: Master System Longplay [082] The Ninja
snippet.description:
Http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

One of the Early Budget games for the master System.I think it came with Transbot.
 
While a short game, its also a hard game so usaly takes many atempts to learn each level and find the secret scrolls.
 
All Green scrolls are found which unlocks the final level. I delibretly miss the entrance to show a few more levels. If you dont find the scrolls, the game loops to give you a chance of finding them.
 
There is some good music in this game but unfortunatly not captured as im pretty much in powered up mode all the way through so you dont get to hear all the tunes. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
